description: The Manx government seeks public views on acceptable levels of pollutants in the island's waters.
title: New water quality regulations proposed to 'protect Manx waterways'
title_page: New water quality regulations proposed to 'protect Manx waterways' - BBC News
maintext: Under the proposals, two new control standards would be introduced to the island's 1993 Water Pollution Act to bring it in line with the UK.
